1000001010001100 1101010111100010 0 -> sum: 0101100001101110, cout: 1
1111001111101100 0110111110101111 0 -> sum: 0110001110011011, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
